reviewText: i bought this mainly for a walk to remember but the other two movies are great too!
Thank you for responding to my email.
The Pay It Forward DVD was messed up and I couldn't view the whole movie! The others two movies were fine!

These are three films I enjoy very much.  I would give this product five stars except for the fact that I have now ordered it twice, and each time it has arrived with at least one defective DVD.  I would very much like to have the product if someone out there can guarantee a defect free series of discs.

This Films of Faith Volume 2 collection would have been a good value but there is not enough Kevin Spacey or Terry O' Quinn.  The Reason I bought This Set Is Because Spacey and O'Quinn look the same and I thought O'Quinn was Spacey in the Classic Film Blind Fury with Rutger O Hauer which I also bought on amazons.  Very good films just not enough Kevin or Terry praise god
looks good even though I haven't watched them yet
No problems with order.  This order made it to me on time.  I would us this vendor again and again.

All three movies offer enrichment rather than corruption.
They all left me feeling hopeful and added value to me and my family.
This guys videos don't play well, I don't know whats the deal....but I won't order again.
